mapper.select: SELECT id, name, report_son_no, columns_first_name FROM abs_enterprise_report_sheet where report_type=#{typeId}

SELECT id, report_son_type, financial_subject, column_excel, order_no, report_son_no, required FROM abs_enterprise_report_model WHERE report_type = #{typeId} ORDER BY report_son_type ASC, order_no ASC

select id, report_time, cal, type, cycle, is_audit, currency, audit_unit, audit_opinion, state creator_name, create_date, update_date, company_id from abs_enterprise_report where id = #{reportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT t1.id, t1.state, report_son_type, t2. name, t2.sheet_order FROM abs_enterprise_report_state t1 JOIN abs_enterprise_report_sheet t2 ON t1.report_son_type = t2.id WHERE t1.report_id = #{reportId} ORDER BY report_son_type asc

SELECT t1.id, report_id, report_model_id, t2.report_son_type, begin_balance, end_balance, begin_excel_name, end_excel_name, t2.financial_subject, t2.column_excel, t2.order_no, t2.report_son_no, t2.required FROM abs_enterprise_report_data_store t1 JOIN abs_enterprise_report_model t2 ON t1.report_model_id = t2.id WHERE report_id = #{reportId} ORDER BY report_model_id asc
